mapper.select: SELECT * FROM blog_posts ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM blog_posts WHERE author_id = #{authorId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT bp.* FROM blog_posts bp JOIN post_tags pt ON bp.id = pt.post_id WHERE pt.tag_id = #{tagId} ORDER BY bp.created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM blog_posts WHERE content_type = #{contentType} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog_posts ( title, author_id, cover_image_url, summary, content, content_type, artist_name, album_name, album_image_url, content_link, view_count ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{authorId}, #{coverImageUrl}, #{summary}, #{content}, #{contentType}, #{artistName}, #{albumName}, #{albumImageUrl}, #{contentLink}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE blog_posts SET title = #{title}, cover_image_url = #{coverImageUrl}, summary = #{summary}, content = #{content}, content_type = #{contentType}, artist_name = #{artistName}, album_name = #{albumName}, album_image_url = #{albumImageUrl}, content_link = #{contentLink}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE blog_posts SET view_count = #{viewCount}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
